## ITransferManager interface

Abstract interface for a transfer manager.

Provides functionality for downloading JSON or ArrayBuffers. Implementations typically implement retry on server congestion, limit the maximum amount of parallel downloads or merge duplicate downloads.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export interface ITransferManager 
```

## Methods

|  Method | Description |
|  --- | --- |
|  [download(url, init)](./harp-transfer-manager.itransfermanager.download.md) | Downloads a URL and returns the response. |
|  [downloadArrayBuffer(url, init)](./harp-transfer-manager.itransfermanager.downloadarraybuffer.md) | Downloads a binary object. |
|  [downloadJson(url, init)](./harp-transfer-manager.itransfermanager.downloadjson.md) | Downloads a JSON object. |
